content: the pale duck is a beanie inspired by the crazy christmas suit from hitman iii if like me you are ambivalent about assassins -- no matter how fine their handknitted headgear -- consider this design a tribute to the duck man of discworld instead should anyone ask you why there are ducks on your hat you should of course reply what ducks the pattern calls for sport weight yarn in the following quantities white 80m/87 yards green 55m/60 yards red 30m/33 yards orange or yellow 1 5m/1 6 yards the sample hat was knitted in rauma finullgarn 175m/50g finull is a woollen-spun rustic norwegian yarn that knits up much more robustly and thickly than a worsted-spun merino yarn of the same yardage and weight happy hogswatch
